title: x64dbg: is there a way to save the complete disassembly of a module to a text file?
content: Is it possible to save the complete disassembly / listing to a file, and if so, how can it be done?

answers_data.content:
From the disassembly window:

  1. Choose the start of your data that you want to copy

  2. Use the mouse wheel or trackpad to go up or down in the disassembly window

    you can also use the arrow keys ↑ ↓ but you need to Press Shift first.

  3. Press Shift and then choose the end of the data that you want to copy, this will highlight the data from the first line you choose till the last line you stopped at.

  4. Above the highlighted data that you want to copy, right click and select copy -> Selection or Selection to File

  5. This is the result
